## Description

Deploy the frontend dashboard to Vercel for a live demo.

## Tasks

- [ ] Deploy frontend to Vercel
- [ ] Configure environment variables (`NEXT_PUBLIC_N8N_WEBHOOK`)
- [ ] Set up n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)
- [ ] Update README with live demo link
- [ ] Test end-to-end functionality

## Notes

- Frontend is ready for deployment
- Need to set up public n8n instance or use n8n Cloud
- Environment variable: `NEXT_PUBLIC_N8N_WEBHOOK` must point to public webhook URL
